00041 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00042 
00043 $Reload= TRUE;
00044 SetRefreshInterval();
00045 
00046 $View->Controller($Output, 'GetDefaultLogFile');
00047 $LogFile= $Output[0];
00048 
00049 $DateArray['Month']= date('m');
00050 $DateArray['Day']= date('d');
00051 $DateArray['Hour']= date('H');
00052 
00053 $GraphType= 'Horizontal';
00054 
00055 if ($_POST) {
00056     $GraphType= $_POST['GraphType'];
00057     $_SESSION[$View->Model]['GraphType']= $GraphType;
00058 }
00059 else if ($_SESSION[$View->Model]['GraphType']) {
00060     $GraphType= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['GraphType'];
00061 }
00062 
00063 $Hour= $DateArray['Hour'];
00064 $Date= $View->FormatDate($DateArray);
00065 
00066 $StatsConf= $Modules[$View->Model]['Stats'];
00067 
00068 $View->Controller($Output, 'GetStats', $LogFile, serialize($DateArray), 'COLLECT');
00069 $Stats= unserialize($Output[0]);
00070 $DateStats= $Stats['Date'];
00071 
00072 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00073 ?>
00074 <table>
00075     <tr>
00076         <td>
00077             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00078                 <?php echo _TITLE('Refresh interval').':' ?>
00079                 <input type="text" name="RefreshInterval" style="width: 20px;" maxlength="2" value="<?php echo $_SESSION[$View->Model]['ReloadRate'] ?>" />
00080                 <?php echo _TITLE('secs') ?>
00081                 <select name="GraphType">
00082                     <option <?php echo ($GraphType == 'Vertical') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Vertical' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Vertical') ?></option>
00083                     <option <?php echo ($GraphType == 'Horizontal') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Horizontal' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Horizontal') ?></option>
00084                 </select>
00085                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00086             </form>
00087         </td>
00088         <td>
00089             <strong><?php echo _TITLE('Date').': '.$Date.', '.$Hour.':'.date('i') ?></strong>
00090         </td>
00091     </tr>
00092 </table>
00093 <?php
00094 foreach ($StatsConf as $Name => $Conf) {
00095     if (isset($Conf['Color'])) {
00096         PrintMinutesGraphNVPSet($DateStats[$Date]['Hours'][$Hour], $Name, $Conf, $GraphType);
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 if (isset($StatsConf['Total']['Counters'])) {
00101     foreach ($StatsConf['Total']['Counters'] as $Name => $Conf) {
00102         PrintMinutesGraphNVPSet($DateStats[$Date]['Hours'][$Hour], $Name, $Conf, $GraphType);
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
